description: MRA-509: field 490 $a repetition sucks. Don't repeat 490$a!
comment: Base's 490$a is bad, but this will not touch it. Fix this issue in Melinda (outside merge)
2023-08-18: after update (changes to punctuation2 validator etc) punctuation betweeb $a subfields changes, and duplicate subfield is removed, which is kind of nice.
